text: An efficient algorithm to determine if an integer array A contains two consecutive integers has time complexity [Assume Auxiliary space O (1)] (A) O (nlogn) whether or not A is sorted. (B) O (n?) whether ornot A is sorted. (C) O (n)if A is sorted, or O (n?) otherwise. (D) O (n)if A is sorted, or O (n log n) otherwise.
